trans-unit.source: Represents the size of a font.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> class with the specified font size in points.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create and initialize an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class using the specified font size.
The following table shows initial property values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object that is created.
Property
Initial value
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.AsUnit> value.

A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> property equal to `value` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A> property equal to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType.Point> value.
A <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that specifies the font size.
value is outside the valid range.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> class with the specified font size.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class using the specified font size.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
Property
Initial Value
A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> property set to the font size specified by the `value` parameter.
The size of the font.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> class with the specified string.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.%23ctor%2A> constructor calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.%23ctor%2A> constructor, using the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A> property for the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> parameter.
A string to specify the font size.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize"></xref>.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> object.
If the `type` parameter contains the value `FontSize.AsUnit`, the following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
Property
Initial Value
A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> object with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> property set to `10`.

If the `type` parameter contains any other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value, the following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
Property
Initial Value
The value of the `type` parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize"></xref> values.
The specified font size is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize"></xref> values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref>.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.IsEmpty%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> passed in the `value` parameter is `true`, the following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
Property
Initial Value

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.IsEmpty%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> passed in the `value` parameter is `false`, the following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
Property
Initial Value
The value of the `value` parameter.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> that specifies the font size.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> class with the specified font size and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"></xref> value.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create and initialize an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class using the specified font size and measuring unit, such as point or pixel.
The following table shows the initial property values for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.
Property
Initial Value
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.AsUnit> value.

A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> property equal to `value` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Type%2A> property equal to `type`.
A <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that specifies the font size.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType"></xref> to specify the units of the size.
value is outside the valid range.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> class with the specified string using the specified <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.%23ctor%2A> constructor recognizes the strings for `value` that are shown in the following table to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class.
String value
`xx-small`, `xxsmall`
`x-small`, `xsmall`
`x-large`, `xlarge`
`xx-large`, `xxlarge`
In all cases, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property has the value <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.NotSet>.
The string comparison is case insensitive.

For all other values of `value`, a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class is created by treating `value` as a font size and setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType.Point>.
A string to specify the font size.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> used to make string comparisons.
Represents an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Empty> field to represent an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.
No HTML rendered output is created when this field is used.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is equivalent to the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> class that this method is called from.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Equals%2A> method to determine whether the specified <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> is equivalent to the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class that this method is called from.

For the specified <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> to be equivalent, the object must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> that contains the same values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> properties as the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class that this method is called from.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that contains the object to compare to this instance.

`true` if the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is equivalent to the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> class that this method is called from; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer that represents the hash code.
Gets a value that indicates whether the font size has been set.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.IsEmpty%2A> property to determine whether the font size has been set.
`true` if the font size has not been set; otherwise, `false`.
Represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type"></xref> property set to `FontSize.Large`.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Large> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.Large`.
In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Large"`.
In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is `<font size="5">`.
Represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type"></xref> property set to `FontSize.Larger`.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Larger> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.Larger`.
In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Larger"`.
In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, no HTML rendered output is created.
Some browers do not recognize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.Larger> font size.
Check your browser for compatibility.
Represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type"></xref> property set to `FontSize.Medium`.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Medium> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.Medium`.
In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Medium"`.
In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is `<font size="4">`.
Compares two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> objects for equality.

For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> objects to be equivalent, each object must have the same values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> properties.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> on the left of the operator that contains font properties.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> on the right of the operator that contains font properties.
`true` if both <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> objects for inequality.

For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> objects to be not equal to each other, each object must either have different values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> property.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> that contains font properties on the left of the operator.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> that contains font properties on the right of the operator.
`true` if both <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> objects are not equal; otherwise, `false`.
Converts the specified string to its <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> equivalent.
Use the static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Parse%2A> method to convert the specified string to its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> equivalent.

If the value of the `s` parameter is not `null`, not <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>, and a valid <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value, the following table shows initial property values for the new instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
Property
Initial Value
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> enumeration equivalent of the `s` parameter.

If the value of the `s` parameter is not `null`, not <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, and an invalid <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value, the following table shows initial property values for the new instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
Property
Initial Value
A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> object with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> property initialized with the `s` parameter in the current thread's culture.

If the value of the `s` parameter is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, the following table shows initial property values for the new instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
Property
Initial Value
A string representation of one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize"></xref> values.
A that represents the font size specified by the s parameter.
Converts the specified string to its <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> equivalent in the specified culture.
Use the static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Parse%2A> method to convert the specified string and culture to its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> equivalent.

If the value of the `s` parameter is not `null`, not <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, and a valid <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value, the following table shows initial property values for the new instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
Property
Initial Value
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> enumeration equivalent of the `s` parameter.

If the value of the `s` parameter is not `null`, not <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, and an invalid <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value, the following table shows initial property values for the new instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
Property
Initial Value
A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> object with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.Value%2A> property initialized with the `s` parameter in the specified culture.

If the value of the `s` parameter is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, the following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
Property
Initial Value
A string representation of one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize"></xref> values.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that represents the culture of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object.
A that represents the font size specified by the s parameter in the culture specified by the culture parameter.
Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> from an integer value.
Use the static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Point%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> that represents the font size specified by the `n` parameter.
An integer representing the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value to convert to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.
A that represents the font size specified by the n parameter.
Represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type"></xref> property set to `FontSize.Small`.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Small> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.Small`.
In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Small"`.
In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is `<font size="3">`.
Represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type"></xref> property set to `FontSize.Smaller`.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Smaller> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.Smaller`.
In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Smaller"`.
In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, no HTML rendered output is created.
Some browers do not recognize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.Smaller> font size.
Check your browser for compatibility.
Converts the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object to the default string representation.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.ToString%2A> method to retrieve the string representation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to `FontSize.AsUnit`, the returned string is the string equivalent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> property.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to any other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value.
The string representation of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object.
Converts the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object to a string representation, using the specified <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.ToString%2A> method to retrieve the string representation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> in the specified culture.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to `FontSize.AsUnit`, the returned string is the string equivalent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> property.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to any other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that contains the culture to represent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.
The string representation of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object in the specified culture.
Converts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object to a string equivalent using the specified format provider.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.ToString%2A> method to retrieve the string representation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object using a culture-specific format provider for any numeric values that are in the string.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.AsUnit> value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the unit value that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> property.
The numeric portion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> value is formatted using the specified `formatProvider`.

In other words, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.AsUnit> value, the returned string representation is generated using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=fullName> method on the unit object that is stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> property.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property is set to any other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> value.

An <xref href="System.IFormatProvider"></xref> that supplies culture-specific formatting information, which is used if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type"></xref> property is set to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize.AsUnit"></xref> value; otherwise, it is ignored.
A string that represents this , with any numeric unit value in the format specified by formatProvider.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize"></xref> enumeration value that represents the font size.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize> enumeration value that represents the font size.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize"></xref> values.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> that represents the font size.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Unit%2A> property to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the font size.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> object that specifies the font size.
Represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type"></xref> property set to `FontSize.XLarge`.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.XLarge> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.XLarge`.
In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:X-Large"`.
In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is `<font size="6">`.
Represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type"></xref> property set to `FontSize.XSmall`.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.XSmall> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.XSmall`.
In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:X-Small"`.
In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is `<font size="2">`.
Represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type"></xref> property set to `FontSize.XXLarge`.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.XXLarge> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.XXLarge`.
In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:XX-Large"`.
In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is `<font size="7">`.
Represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type"></xref> property set to `FontSize.XXSmall`.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.XXSmall> field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.XXSmall`.
In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:XX-Small"`.
In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is `<font size="1">`.
